item.title: Claude Code Tamagotchi: Your VSCode Coding Pet and AI Buddy
item.description: Turn coding into a nurturing game: Claude Code Tamagotchi lives in your VSCode status bar, reacts to your real coding activity, and offers gentle reminders and companionship. Includes a 3‑minute setup (npm/bun), local save, and CLI interactions.
